verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>me<s%>, Go <S%H157>again<s%>, love a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H157>beloved<s%> of her <S%H7453>friend<s%>, and an <S%H5003>adulteress<s%>, even as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H160>loveth<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, though they <S%H6437>turn<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H809>cakes<s%> of <S%H6025>raisins<s%>.
So I <S%H3739>bought<s%> her to me for <S%H6240>fifteen<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and a <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%>, and a <S%H3963>half-homer<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%>;

and I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3427>her<s%>, Thou shalt abide for me <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; thou shalt not play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, and thou shalt not <S%H1961>be<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%>'s wife: so will I also be toward thee.

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3427>abide<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> without <S%H4428>king<s%>, and without <S%H8269>prince<s%>, and without <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>, and without <S%H4676>pillar<s%>, and without <S%H646>ephod<s%> or <S%H8655>teraphim<s%>:

afterward <S%H310><s%> shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%>, and <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H1732>David<s%> their <S%H4428>king<s%>, and shall come with <S%H6342>fear<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> and to his <S%H2898>goodness<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
